description.zh: 配置管理子插件 - JSON插件的配置相关功能
description.en: Configuration management subplugin - config-related features for JSON plugin

show.command: echo '⚙️ json-with-subplugins config show | Subplugin: config | Type: JSON | Function: Show configuration'

validate.command: echo '✅ json-with-subplugins config validate | Subplugin: config | Status: Valid | All settings OK'
